name: SBK 12: Generations
summary: The official game of the FIM Superbike World Championship with the most complete motorcycling simulation ever created. Live through the last four seasons, including the new 2012 season, of the SBK world championships: become world champion, try the new SBK Experience mode, and win the brand new one-manufacturer races. With SBK Generations, Milestone has developed a masterpiece: the definitive motorcycle game!
